name: Spirit Chain
description:
Buggi has been haunted by their sibling, Zephyr, since their death.  Now, after waking up in a strange place, they must use their forces to escape while figuring out where and why they were imprisoned. 

Since their death, Zephyr hasn’t been able to move on - too scared to leave Buggi’s side.  The fear of the afterlife has left them tethered to their twin.  Now that they need to use Zephyr’s lack of corporeal form to get out of this prison, they’ll have to face their fear of leaving Buggi’s side one step and a time.
